name: Larcin Lazer (itch)
description:
In Larcin Lazer, observe, remember and dance to avoid the lasers.

  • You have to complete all the levels (8) without getting caught to finish the game, good luck!
  • Use the arrows to move
  • Remember the lasers' positions to avoid theme
  • Reach the jewel at the end of each level

Made in 4 hours and 15 minutes, live on twitch, for the Trijam #71

Code, art and design : Géraud Zucchini

Music : Antoine Druaux
